thread.title: Footy McFooty Face or Bad Hombres? Fans vote for San Diego's MLS team name
thread.title_full: Footy McFooty Face or Bad Hombres? Fans vote for San Diego's MLS team name

title: Footy McFooty Face or Bad Hombres? Fans vote for San Diego's MLS team name
text:
Footy McFooty Face or Bad Hombres? Fans vote for San Diego's MLS team name Getty Images 0 Mar 24, 2017 2:05:47 PM Landon Donovan is hoping to bring a Major League Soccer franchise to his hometown, but we're not so sure he'll get approved with these team names 
Maybe it's not such a good idea to allow fans vote for a team's name, especially when you're hoping to join MLS! 
Donovan and Co., who are looking to bring MLS to San Diego, have narrowed the list down to 20 potential names, with 'Footy McFooty Face' leading the way. 
Yes, the San Diego Footy McFooty Face may be playing against your favorite club one day... BREAKING: Footy McFooty Face is leading the online Facebook vote for San Diego's MLS club name. pic.twitter.com/6rTXRwxYeC â€” NBC Sports Soccer (@NBCSportsSoccer) March 24, 2017 
In second place, is the respectable and realistic name, 'San Diego Surf.' Rounding out the top three is none other than the 'Bad Hombres,' thanks to President Trump's use of the phrase. 
Then there are the basic, or shall we say boring, names like San Diego Football Club, San Diego Soccer Club and Athletic Club San Diego. 
When it's all said and done, we can all assume the name won't actually be the Footy McFooty Face, but at least Soccer City SD brought attention to their ambitions of joining MLS. Related
